title: Adversarial Physics Verification: Z₃ Measurement Extension

tests.name: Eigenvalue degeneracy is measure-zero
tests.details: Distinct case: diagonal only=True, Degenerate: all commute=True, Measure-zero: 0/1000 samples degenerate

tests.name: Anomaly coefficient verification
tests.details: T(fundamental) = 0.5000 (expected 0.5), All 8 generators consistent: True. Note: k=1 primarily from uniqueness argument, not anomaly

tests.name: Limiting cases physical consistency
tests.details: Γ << Γ_crit: coherent (factor=0.951), Γ >> Γ_crit: decohered (factor=3.72e-44), Classical: 3 sectors

tests.name: Strong CP mechanism verification
tests.details: Z₃-instanton action: verified, θ-periodicity 2π/3: True, V(θ) min at θ=0: True (energies: ['0.000', '1.500', '1.500'])

tests.name: Superselection structure rigorous test
tests.details: Z₃ action correct: True, O invariant: True, Superselection: True, Non-invariant O identified: True

tests.name: k=1 uniqueness for dim H = |Z(G)|
tests.details: Tested SU(N) for N=2,3,4,5: k=1 unique in all cases: True

tests.name: Unitarity preservation in Z₃ sectors
tests.details: Total probability: 1.000000 (expect 1), All positive: True, Norm after evolution: 1.000000

tests.name: Operational Z₃ survives quark coupling
tests.details: Bilinear ψ̄ψ invariant: True, Baryon ω³=1: True, Single quark changes: True
